name: CharStyleMappings
shortdesc: A collection of char style mappings.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new CharStyleMapping &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the CharStyleMapping.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharStyleMapping with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharStyleMappings within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The CharStyleMapping, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: CharStyleMapping, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The CharStyleMapping, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: CharStyleMapping, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first CharStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last CharStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle CharStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharStyleMapping with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the CharStyleMapping that follows the desired CharStyleMapping.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the CharStyleMapping whose index follows the specified CharStyleMapping in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The CharStyleMapping whose index comes before the desired CharStyleMapping.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any CharStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every CharStyleMapping in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CharStyleMapping.
Returns the CharStyleMapping with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
